paper_abstract: EBImage provides general purpose functionality for reading, writing, processing and analysis of images. Furthermore, in the context of microscopy- based cellular assays, EBImage offers tools to segment cells and extract quantitative cellular descriptors. This allows the automation of such tasks using the R programming language and use of existing tools in the R environment for signal processing, statistical modeling, machine learning and data visualization.
paper_title: EBImage-an R package for image processing with applications to cellular phenotypes
